sourcesContent: import Grid from "@mui/material/Grid"; import Typography from "@mui/material/Typography"; import Box from "@mui/material/Box"; import Stack from "@mui/material/Stack"; import Container from "@mui/material/Container"; import TravelExploreIcon from "@mui/icons-material/TravelExplore"; import AppRegistrationIcon from "@mui/icons-material/AppRegistration"; const HeroSection = () => { return ( {/* Background Image */} {/* Right Side: Content */} Welcome to Alkebuleum {/* Description Content */} Pan-African Blockchain network powering decentralized applications that address real-world challenges. {/* List of Square Buttons with Hover Effect */} {/* Button 1: Get AKE */} {/* Replace with actual link */} {/* Embedded SVG for AKE Logo */} Get AKE {/* Button 2: Block Explorer */} {/* Replace with actual link */} {/* Dark brown color */} Block Explorer {/* Button 3: Try Apps */} {/* Replace with actual link */} {/* Dark brown color */} Try Apps ); }; export default HeroSection;
